issue.title: Synchronisation should be an option
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Just like "assignation feature" (see #749), synchronization feature should be optionnal as a global catalog'soption.

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.4

comments.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

This is done but I can't change the status. Could you please mark it as resolved?

Thanks and Happy new year!

**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

It's done and committed in svn?

**Original author :** Portier Thomas

yes, in the 4.2.x branche
